item.title: EKC 20 IS THE LATEST VERSION AS OF NOW. SYSTEM IS RUNNING GREAT. IF YOU ARE HAVING ISSUES STREAMING A CERTAIN SHOW OR MOVIE TRY SELECTING YOUR LINK MANUALLY. THANK YOU ALL FOR SUPPORTING AND KEEPING EKC STRONG!
DONATIONS ARE ALWAYS VERY APPRECIATED-IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO DONATE YOU CAN AT PAYPAL.ME/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG - YOU CAN PURCHASE PRELOADED DEVICES AT ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM
SIGN UP FOR GEARS TV FOR A PREMIUM SETUP. SIGN UP AT https://drob.tech/aff.php?aff=17 THIS SERVICE IS AMAZING. GREAT GUIDE AS WELL. APKS ARE AVAILABLE FOR DOWNLOAD IN THE APK SECTION.
THANK YOU ALL FOR YOUR SUPPORT. HAPPY STREAMING
IF YOU NEED ANY SUPPORT YOU CAN EMAIL ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG@GMAIL.COM OR MESSAGE US ON OUR FACEBOOK PAGE / FACEBOOK.COM/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG
